workLog.action: Fixed Comment 1: PostToolUse quick scan output parsing
workLog.details: Changed hook from -Format console to -Format json and added JSON parsing logic to extract TotalFindings from machine-readable output

workLog.action: Fixed Comment 2: Removed extra CWEs from quick scan config
workLog.details: Removed CWE-020 (Improper Input Validation) and CWE-611 (XXE) queries to keep only the requested critical CWEs: 078, 079, 089, 022, 798

workLog.action: Fixed Comment 3: Added 30-second timeout to QuickScan mode
workLog.details: Added -QuickScan parameter to Invoke-CodeQLDatabaseAnalyze function, wrapped analysis in Start-Job with 30-second timeout, returns graceful degradation on timeout per ADR-035

workLog.action: Fixed Comment 4: Replaced stub validation in diagnostics
workLog.details: Replaced stub ConvertFrom-Yaml with real Test-YamlSyntax function from Test-CodeQLConfig.ps1, updated Test-DatabaseCacheSimple to check config hash, scripts hash, and config directory hash using same logic as Test-DatabaseCache

nextSteps: Test the CodeQL quick scan hook with actual Python/workflow file writes
Verify quick scan config only runs the 5 critical CWE queries
Test QuickScan timeout behavior with slow analysis
Verify diagnostics properly detects config/cache invalidation
